{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Yanfei
|date               = 2023-07-28
|zh                 = :'''烟绯：'''好久不见！最近有遇到什么好玩的事情吗？
:'''旅行者：'''收集了不少新奇的物产呢。
:'''派蒙：'''正好今天带来了一些，烟绯要不要试试给它们估价？
:'''烟绯：'''没问题，包在我身上！
:'''烟绯：'''这朵树王圣体菇保存完好，应该能卖个好价钱，我想想…一千摩拉？香辛料有些受潮，超过五百摩拉就不划算了。
:'''烟绯：'''咦，这个盒子有些奇怪…
:'''旅行者：'''要不要打开看看？
:'''烟绯：'''欸，这个…难道是送给我的？
:'''派蒙：'''生日快乐！这是我和旅行者为你准备的礼物哦。
:'''烟绯：'''难怪称量得出的结果是这样…旅行者、派蒙，谢谢你们啦！
|dialogue_review_zh = 难怪称量得出的结果是这样…旅行者、派蒙，谢谢你们啦！
|en                 = ;Today is [[Yanfei]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Yanfei:''' We haven't met for a long time! Have you experienced something interesting recently!
:'''Traveler:''' We have collected a lot of amazing specialities.
:'''Paimon:''' We brought some today, so why not try appraising them?
:'''Yanfei:''' No problem, just count on me!
:'''Yanfei:''' This Rukkhashava Mushroom is in well condition, so it should be worth a good price. I think... maybe a thousand Mora? The spices are not that well kept, so over five hundred would be too expensive.
:'''Yanfei:''' Wait, something's not quite right with this box...
:'''Traveler:''' Why not open it and have a look?
:'''Yanfei:''' So... this is for me?
:'''Paimon:''' Happy birthday! This is a gift we prepared for you.
:'''Yanfei:''' No wonder the result is like this... Thank you traveler and Paimon!
|dialogue_review_en = No wonder the result is like this... Thank you traveler and Paimon!
}}
